surepy.data.properties.statistics module¶

surepy.data.properties.statistics.statistics(locdata, statistic_keys=('count', 'min', 'max', 'mean', 'median', 'std', 'sem'))[source]¶

Compute statistics for localization data.

Parameters:
  • locdata (LocData or Pandas DataFrame) – localization data
  • statistic_keys (tuple of strings) – pandas statistic functions. Default: (‘count’, ‘min’, ‘max’, ‘mean’, ‘median’, ‘std’, ‘sem’)
Returns:

A dict with descriptive statistics.
Return type:

dict
